casebody.data:
Mary J. Conley, Respondent v. The Forty-second Street, Manhattanville & St. Nicholas Avenue Railway Co., Appellant. Decided June 20,1888. Appeal by defendant from a judgment entered on the verdict of a jury, and from an order denying defendant’s motion for a new trial. William C. Trull, for appellant. Herbert W. Grindal and Austen G. Fox, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman J.

Per Curiam.

The judgment and order should be affirmed with costs.
